item.title: pve安装和使用
item.author: lyj
item.description: 基础安装 2.1 修改 apt 软件源 编辑source.list文件 nano /etc/apt/sources.list 1 粘贴以下内容 deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ bullseye main non-free contrib deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ bullseye-updates main non-free contrib deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ bullseye-backports main non-free contrib deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian-security/ stable-security main non-free contrib deb-src http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ bullseye main non-free contrib deb-src http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ bullseye-updates main non-free
